22.movie_plot: During World War II, a rebellious U.S. Army Major is assigned a dozen convicted murderers to train and lead them into a mass assassination mission of German officers.

24.movie_plot: Architect/vigilante Paul Kersey takes on the members of a vicious Los Angeles drug cartel to stop the flow of drugs after his girlfriend's daughter dies from an overdose.

20.movie_plot: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

19.movie_plot: In 2002, two rival Olympic ice skaters were stripped of their gold medals and permanently banned from men's single competition. Presently, however, they've found a loophole that will allow them to qualify as a pairs team.

21.movie_plot: During the Vietnam War, Captain Willard is sent on a dangerous mission into Cambodia to assassinate a renegade Colonel who has set himself up as a god among a local tribe.

23.movie_plot: The World War II phase of the career of the controversial American general, George S. Patton.

1.movie_plot: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

7.movie_plot: A young soldier in Vietnam faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.

3.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi (1983)
3.movie_plot: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy a more powerful Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

4.movie_plot: In the waning days of World War II, the United States Navy cargo ship Reluctant and her crew are stationed in the "backwater" areas of the Pacific Ocean. Trouble ensues when the crew members are granted liberty.

15.movie_plot: 57 years later, Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team during her hypersleep. The moon from the original movie has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will that be enough?

6.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
6.movie_plot: After the rebels are overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda. His friends accept shelter from a questionable ally as Darth Vader hunts them in a plan to capture Luke.

16.movie_plot: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the U.S. Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of people in a small industrial town in Pennsylvania.

5.movie_plot: A British team is sent to cross occupied Greek territory and destroy the massive German gun emplacement that commands a key sea channel.

14.movie_plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

12.movie_name: All Quiet on the Western Front (1930)
12.movie_plot: A young soldier faces profound disillusionment in the soul-destroying horror of World War I.

0.movie_plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazi Germans.

2.movie_plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

11.movie_plot: Karl Childers, a simple man hospitalized since his childhood murder of his mother and her lover, is released to start a new life in a small town.

8.movie_plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

17.movie_plot: The story of the final Emperor of China.

9.movie_name: Monty Python and the Holy Grail (1974)
9.movie_plot: King Arthur and his knights embark on a low-budget search for the Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

18.movie_plot: A British soldier kidnapped by IRA terrorists soon befriends one of his captors, who then becomes drawn into the soldier's world.

13.movie_plot: The staff of an army hospital in the Korean war find that laughter is the best way to deal with their situation.

10.movie_plot: Peggy Sue faints at a high school reunion. When she wakes up, she finds herself in her own past, just before she finished school.
